alert.note: Alert for Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 4:21PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Columbia and east central Suwannee Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 421 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake City, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Columbia, Wellborn, Five Points, Watertown and Winfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
